props.displayValue: The value that determines the month to show. This is different from modelValue, which determines the selected value.
props.month: The current month number to show
props.weekdays: An array of weekdays to display.
props.weeksInMonth: A dynamic number of weeks in a month will grow and shrink depending on how many days are in the month. A static number always shows 7 weeks.
props.year: The current year number to show
